COMMENT_TX: $Chase Utley overran the throw and then slipped on the wet grass; Ray Durham stopped at 3B and then ran home when Utley fell
Rickie Weeks left the game due to an injured knee; he was removed from playoff roster, replaced by Alcides Escobar
$Shane Victorino called for interference at 2B; Victorino did not slide; Ryan Howard scored on the play but was sent back to 3B
$the fly to LF hit a cable near the roof and caromed back towards the infield; great catch by Craig Counsell
